name: Metal Bear Liquid
description:
Controls:

WASD -  Movement

C - Toggle Crouch

Space - Jump / Advance dialogue

F - Interact with prompt

Left Shift - Sneak

====================================

NOTES:
- If no music is playing when the game starts, refresh the page and it should work.
- Page theme and descriptions were updated shortly after submission, but not the game itself.
